parameters.name: x
parameters.desc: A vector of strings (i.e. 'x1a-x1b,x2a-x2b' naming the pairs of interest in data. Here x1a,x1b is first pair, and x2a,x2b is the second pair

parameters.name: hypothesis
parameters.desc: 'different' (default), 'greaterthan' or 'lessthan',the alternative hypothesis; measure 1 different to measure 2, measure 1 greater than measure 2, and measure 1 less than measure 2 respectively

parameters.name: effectsize
parameters.desc: 1 or 0 (default), provide Cohen's d effect sizes

parameters.name: ci
parameters.desc: 1 or 0 (default), provide confidence intervals for the mean difference

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.desc: It contains the names of one or more datasets, in which the algorithm will be executed. It cannot be empty.
